title: 98/176/EC: Commission Decision of 18 February 1998 approving the plan presented by Spain for the surveillance of classical swine fever (Only the Spanish text is authentic) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 18 February 1998 approving the plan presented by Spain for the surveillance of classical swine fever (Only the Spanish text is authentic) (Text with EEA relevance) (98/176/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme submitted by Spain for the surveillance of classical swine fever is hereby approved.
Spain shall bring into force the laws, regulations and administrative provisions for implementing the programme referred to in Article 1.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Spain.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 February 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
